code: export var signInStart=function signInStart(usernameAndPassword){return{type:'SIGN_IN_START',payload:usernameAndPassword};};export var signInSuccess=function signInSuccess(user){return{type:'SIGN_IN_SUCCESS',payload:user};};export var signInFailure=function signInFailure(errMsg){return{type:'SIGN_IN_FAILURE',payload:errMsg};};export var signOutStart=function signOutStart(){return{type:'SIGN_OUT_START'};};export var signOutSuccess=function signOutSuccess(successMessage){return{type:'SIGN_OUT_SUCCESS',payload:successMessage};};export var signOutFailure=function signOutFailure(errorMessage){return{type:'SIGN_OUT_FAILURE',payload:errorMessage};};export var signUpStart=function signUpStart(userData){return{type:'SIGN_UP_START',payload:userData};};export var signUpSuccess=function signUpSuccess(user){return{type:'SIGN_UP_SUCCESS',payload:user};};export var signUpFailure=function signUpFailure(errorMessage){return{type:'SIGN_UP_FAILURE',payload:errorMessage};};export var checkUserSession=function checkUserSession(){return{type:'CHECK_USER_SESSION'};};export var changePasswordStart=function changePasswordStart(userAndPasswords){return{type:'CHANGE_PASSWORD_START',payload:userAndPasswords};};export var changePasswordSuccess=function changePasswordSuccess(successMessage){return{type:'CHANGE_PASSWORD_SUCCESS',payload:successMessage};};export var changePasswordFailure=function changePasswordFailure(errorMessage){return{type:'CHANGE_PASSWORD_FAILURE',payload:errorMessage};};
